Hans RÃƒÂ¼di Giger, designer of the original Alien featured in Ridley Scotts Masterpiece back 1979 died yesterday at the age of 74 in ZÃƒÂ¼rich, Switzerland.

I will surely miss his ingenious and somewhat disturbing art that influenced so many modern movies and art projects.

He also did a german audiobook horror series called H. R. Gigers Vampiric. May he rest in peace.
If you're not familiar with Gigers work, a word of warning for the tender hearted before you google him. His work can be rather explicit.

RIP king of nightmares!

As a Swiss, I almost feel ashamed at how little recognition he got in his own home country.

If you're not familiar with Gigers work, a word of warning for the tender hearted before you google him. His work can be rather explicit.

LIES! It was all about pink unicorns and fluffy bunnies
